keywords.indexterm: XML Schema Text EditorXML Schema actions

li.p: The Show Definition () action, accessed from the Document Schema menu, moves the cursor to the definition of the referenced XML Schema item. You can also use the shortcut on a reference to display its definition. The referenced item can be an element, group, simple type or complex type. The same action is executed on a double click on a component name in the Schema Outline view. You can define a scope for this action in the same manner you define it for Search Declarations.
